statements: SELECT * FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Campaign A';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE success_rate > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, success_rate FROM phishing_campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(success_rate) FROM phishing_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, success_rate FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE success_rate > 0.5 AND start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE 'Phishing%' OR success_rate < 0.2;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, success_rate FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-03-01' AND end_date < '2022-09-30' ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM phishing_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM phishing_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, total_emails_sent FROM phishing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM phishing_results WHERE opened = TRUE
SELECT recipient_email FROM phishing_results WHERE clicked = TRUE
SELECT * FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE total_emails_sent > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, recipient_email, opened FROM phishing_results WHERE opened = true AND clicked = false;
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) FROM phishing_results GROUP BY campaign_id;

SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date, COUNT(*) as emails_reported FROM phishing_campaigns JOIN phishing_results ON phishing_campaigns.campaign_id = phishing_results.campaign_id WHERE reported = true GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM phishing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE success_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM campaign_participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, email FROM campaign_participants WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT cm.metric_type, cm.value, pc.participant_name FROM campaign_metrics cm JOIN campaign_participants pc ON cm.campaign_id = pc.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM phishing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, success_rate FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE success_rate > 0.5;
SELECT participant_name, email FROM campaign_participants WHERE campaign_id = 'd3f57e0d-4021-4b9f-b373-5a1c0174b31c';
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM campaign_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM phishing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, success_rate FROM phishing_campaigns;
SELECT end_date, start_date, success_rate FROM phishing_campaigns ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT email_id, recipient_email, opened FROM emails WHERE opened = true;
SELECT stat_id, campaign_id, open_timestamp, click_timestamp FROM statistics WHERE click_timestamp IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM phishing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM phishing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, success_rate FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE success_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE opened = true;
SELECT email_id, recipient_email, opened FROM emails JOIN phishing_campaigns ON emails.campaign_id = phishing_campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM phishing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM phishing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, target_url FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE target_url LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics WHERE open_rate > 0.8 AND click_rate < 0.5;
SELECT log_id, email_address, sent_date FROM email_logs ORDER BY sent_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM phishing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM phishing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT l.sent_date, l.opened, c.open_rate FROM email_logs l JOIN campaign_metrics c ON l.campaign_id = c.campaign_id;
SELECT DISTINCT l.email_address, c.conversion_rate FROM email_logs l JOIN campaign_metrics c ON l.campaign_id = c.campaign_id WHERE c.conversion_rate > 0.1;
SELECT p.campaign_name, COUNT(cl.click_id) AS total_clicks FROM phishing_campaigns p LEFT JOIN link_clicks cl ON p.campaign_id = cl.log_id GROUP BY p.campaign_name ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
